doc:
William Johnstone (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Johnstone_(actor) 0 William S. Johnstone, also known as Bill Johnstone (1908-1996) was an American radio and screen actor. He is best known for his voice work as the title character on The Shadow for five seasons from 1938-1943. William_S._Johnstone , also_known as Bill_Johnstone ( 1908-1996 ) was an_American_radio_and_screen_actor . He is_best_known for his_voice_work as the_title_character on The_Shadow for five_seasons from 1938-1943 .
